org.kohsuke.args4j

Class ProxyOptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.OptionHandler<Object>
      • org.kohsuke.args4j.ProxyOptionHandler

  • public class ProxyOptionHandler
extends org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.OptionHandler<Object>
    The ProxyOptionHandler allows options to have associated options. For example, an enum option might have different options depending of its value.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
